abstract.text: Returns the value of the given property.

inlineContent.text: The record whose value you wish to obtain.
whose value you wish to obtain. May be a pre-defined or program-defined property. See
for a list of properties all records have, and specific ABRecord derived opaque types for any additional properties.
.The type of the returned value depends on the property type (see PropertyTypes for a list of possible property types). You are responsiblefor releasing this object.

abstract.text: Access the centralized database for storing users’ contacts.
Adds a record of the specified type to the Address Book database.
Returns the record that matches the given unique ID.
Returns the type name of the record that matches a given unique ID.
Returns a string containing the formatted address.
Integer that identifies a record property.
A reference to an ABRecord object or any of its derivedopaque types.
Returns the type of the given record.
Returns the unique ID of the receiver.
Returns the value of the given property.
Returns a copy of the given record.
Returns whether or not the record is read-only.
Removes the value of the given property.
Sets the value of a given property for a record.
Removes the specified record from the Address Book database.
A reference to a CFString object.
An untyped "generic" reference to any Core Foundation object.
A type for propagating an unmanaged object reference.

inlineContent.text: The record whose value you wish to obtain.
